EmailTemplate.description: Email blast to ZDNet import introducing the CSA
EmailTemplate.name: ZD Bill Rate Blast
EmailTemplate.subject: How can MBO Partners Help Your Solo Business Thrive?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}},
My name is {{lead.EM FName:default=Steve}} {{lead.EM LName:default=Arhancet}} and I am a Consultant Services Advisor at MBO Partners <http://www.mbopartners.com/#whoweare>. If you found the bill rate resource guide <http://www.mbopartners.com/files/pdfs/mbo-bill-rate-resource-guide.pdf> that you downloaded helpful, you may wish to check out our video <http://www.mbopartners.com/#howwehelp> or sign up for our free, monthly Independent Consulting Brief <http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief>.
Regards, {{lead.EM FName:default=Steve}} ___________________________________ {{lead.EM FName:default=Steve}} {{lead.EM LName:default=Arhancet}} Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6000 f: 703-793-6070 e: {{lead.EM Email:default=sarhancet@mbopartners.com}} w: www.mbopartners.com
